Good Comments: Typo's, as well as slightly annoying typesetting. Spelling and Grammar mistakes, too.
Sekai is a good fansubbing group by themselves. too bad they decided to team up with a crappy group like Philantrophy. T_T
spelling mistakes, grammar mistakes, typos, changing rugby to football, odd choice of translators note on ethanol.
Bad Comments: Failanthropy and Sekai have done a terrible job again. They should quit now.
Lots of spelling mistakes and out of sync.
There are grammar mistakes. Sentences could've been structured better. Cursing doesn't seem to fit in with an anime like Clannad.
Subs are too long and often ambiguous, grammar is iffy.
